492880.name: Virtual Insanity
492880.description:
FULL HTC VIVE SUPPORT COMING SOON!!!!!

****May 2017 update****
I have been re-mastering the old DK2 version of this game and am currently adding HTC VIVE support. I am adding a few videos of some progress, just see above. ****

Virtual Insanity is a first person psychological horror game and was created from the ground up for VR.
Enter a nightmare where you will lose your sense of reality. Have you lost your mind? Or has the world around you gone mad?

This is a single-player game.

Built from the ground up for the VR.
I started creating this game in October of 2015. This is my first full game and 3rd Unity project, I spent 7 months working on the current release, but have been remastering it for VIVE/room-scale ever since, by myself, and started it with less than a year of Unity and game design experience.
492880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
